December 17, 2014, Melissa worked with Joe in the same group

I worked with Melissa for a little over a year as a colleague at CBS local media.  Melissa is simply superwoman.  I have been in media and sales for over 22 years and I can safely say she gets after it as much or more than anyone I have ever worked with over that time .  Melissa has a motor that is unmatched. She does not quit.  I have said to her on a number of occasions, working with her has driven me to work harder just to keep up with her drive.  She has a huge heart personally and professionally, a quick study and would be a huge addition to any staff.  Melissa is witty, respectful, gets along with everyone and is very loyal.  If you have a chance to recruit her into your organization don't miss out, you may be sorry if she decides to work for a competitor.  Meet with her, bring her on board, then just stay out of her way and watch her do her thing.

summary: Accomplished Marketing Executive with an entrepreneurial mindset and 10+ years in sales and marketing. Offering integrated project experience in traditional radio advertising, promotions, experiential event marketing, digital solutions and social media strategy and content. Adept in pitching new accounts and building executive-level relationships. I have worked on integrated campaigns for major advertisers and have been recognized with several awards during my career.My clients know me as a highly creative media strategist who can always be trusted to come up with a new and fresh approach. I know that the client’s business comes first, and I never try to impose my ideas on others. Instead, I spend a lot of time understanding the business and the audience before suggesting ideas and solutions. I’m truly passionate about my work and always eager to connect with other marketers. While I enjoy all aspects of my job, I think my favorite stage of a project is working with the client or business unit leader to understand his or her business objectives. As we go through that collaborative process, the ideas start to flow and that’s always the fun part!
name: Melissa Narvaez
title: Entrepreneur, Founder, Digital Coach, Sales Leader & Social Media Scientist
